short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click way to look up Berkeley courses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple browser extension that adds a "Show course preview" option to the right-click menu whenever a course name is selected. The option gets data from the same database used by guide.berkeley.edu, and displays it in a popup allowing you to quickly get information on a specific Berkeley course. It's particularly good for when only quick information like the description, prereqs, and recently offered terms is needed.
